name: Almost Plain Text File
summary: Learn about .APT files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: You can edit APT files with any text editor since the files are saved in a plain text format.
NOTE: APT files are similar to Wiki webpages, which are also written in a simple markup language intended to be displayed as HTML.

description: Text document written in Almost Plain Text (APT), a simple markup language that describes the formatting of a text document; can be converted to HTML, PDF, PostScript, RTF, or other formats using a document generation program such as Aptconvert, which is often used with Maven software development tools.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .apt file in Indigo Rose AutoPlay Media Studio 9
images.caption: APT file open in Indigo Rose AutoPlay Media Studio 9
